data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the most recent published articles from the Times Newswire. Returns a stream of article metadata including links, publication timestamps, and article details. Supports filtering via query parameters. Requires API key authentication.

Missing summary and description entirely. Added action-oriented summary and comprehensive description explaining path parameters (source and section), what filtering they provide, expected return content, and authentication requirements. This enables AI agents to understand when to use this operation and how to construct requests.

data.summary_suggestion: Get articles by source and section
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves published articles filtered by news source and content section. The source parameter specifies the publication (e.g., 'nytimes'), and section parameter filters by topic area (e.g., 'world', 'business'). Returns article metadata including links, publication timestamps, and article details. Requires API key authentication.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and description entirely. This enables AI agents to understand when to use this operation and how to construct requests.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves published articles filtered by news source, content section, and time period. The source parameter specifies the publication, section parameter filters by topic area, and time-period parameter limits results to a specific timeframe (e.g., '1', '7', '30' for days). Returns article metadata including links, publication timestamps, and article details. Requires API key authentication.
